mapper.select: SELECT S.STORE_NAME, S.STORE_OPEN_TIME, S.STORE_CLOSE_TIME, I.ITEM_NAME, I.ITEM_PRICE, II.ITEM_IMAGE_NUMBER, II.ITEM_IMAGE_SYSTEM_NAME, II.ITEM_IMAGE_ORIGINAL_NAME, I.ITEM_NUMBER FROM TBL_STORE S JOIN TBL_ITEM I ON S.BUSINESS_NUMBER = I.BUSINESS_NUMBER JOIN TBL_ITEM_IMAGE II ON I.ITEM_NUMBER = II.ITEM_NUMBER WHERE I.ITEM_SELL_STATE = 'Y'
